website_summaries.verdict: An affordable, compact model that's accurate and easy to use. If you want a heads-up display that focuses on direction and speed, this is an inexpensive option.
pros: A basic, no-frills model that displays speed and compass without glare
Can be set to miles per hour or kilometers per hour
Has an over-speed alarm that can be set according to local limits to keep your speed in check
cons: Some of the components, such as buttons and ports, don't seem very durable
A few consumers gripe about missing cords upon arrival

customer_reviews.title: Works very well!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived as scheduled. Took a few speed adjustments and it tracks with the speedometer. The speed is easy to read on the windshield without the film. You can't really see the compass heading however I believe if I were to use the film I probably could. You can see it at night. The GPS syncs after a few seconds.i ran the power wire to a spare fuse under the dash so no wires to see. Great product! Thank you. Jk
customer_reviews.author: J K

customer_reviews.title: Simple compact design. Does what it says.
customer_reviews.text: PRO: Speed display is large and bright enough for any conditions. Speed is calculated from GPS - More accurate than car speedometers. Uncluttered display omits the usual useless engine data. Needs no car connections except 12V DC Can be viewed directly or reflected from windshield. CON: Windshield reflection is not visible through polarized sunglasses.. Displays other than speed are too small and dim for most daytime viewing. Badly translated instructions will take a while to figure out. Complicated and counter-intuitive controls. OK once you figure it out.
customer_reviews.author: P H B

customer_reviews.title: Works OK
customer_reviews.text: I am not able to get it to match my car speedometer. It is close but not right on. The directions to set it up is very unclear. At least to me. it took a while to figure out. The unit works, I see it fine in daylight and at night. For a cheap unit it does what it says.
customer_reviews.author: Kirk B.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Power port is very sensitive and unit doesn't stay powered when driving on slightly rough roads.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easily installed, easy to read
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Easily installed, easy to read, accurate enough (+/- 2 mph) Cons: Sometimes it takes a minute to triangulate Overall, for a $30 GPS speedometer, it seems to be a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Rev. Weavil

customer_reviews.title: viewing digital speed
customer_reviews.text: Used this product to display on my windshield MPH so that I can keep my eyes on the road.
customer_reviews.author: Heloman

customer_reviews.title: It works, but you can tell you get what u pay for.
customer_reviews.text: It works very good and I think was worth the purchase, but you can tell it is cheap. First day out of the box I was not paying attention and set the unit down wrong on the stand and broke the plastic adjustment gear, but we made do with a screwdriver. Also it is usually a mph or two off but perfect for my boat.
customer_reviews.author: joeydean318

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy solution...
customer_reviews.text: Installed this in my 73 VW Karmann Ghia... It is easy to read while driving and was easy to install. Much better than trying to replace original gauges and much cheaper.

customer_reviews.title: Power problem
customer_reviews.text: I like it. I only wanted a compass, so I put black tape over the speed readout and stuck it onto the dash, But it turns itself off, even when standing still. Have to remove the plug and re-plug. It would be nice if they would address this. Had to return it. It just stopped turning on, for no reason. I did order another one, I like it if It works

customer_reviews.title: Easy to read speed and works well. Good value
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Easy to read on windscreen without reflective strip. Accurate speed and nice to have compass reading as well. Very satisfied.

customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. Incredible how bright the LED's are. Can see it clearly in bright sunlight.

customer_reviews.title: 2 speed display MPH and KMH, showing simple information all I need
customer_reviews.text: Great product. easy to install. It can project bright enough. I struggled at first to change from metric to MPH, once I played with it, I found it was pretty easy. Its a no frill's display, showing only speed and compass, but that is all I really wanted since my new car doesn't have a digital speedometer. I hope it keeps working for a few years.
customer_reviews.author: William Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Works better than the actual speedometer!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item just so it would display the speed I am driving.. This works good and it was very easy to install. It works very well at night.and during the day you can see the display. I did not need the reflection film that came with it. I have a Honda Fit.

customer_reviews.title: It was pretty good for the time we had it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought to replace broken speedometer and it's been working great

customer_reviews.title: Definitely usable
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to install and has a great screen that's been very easy to both see as well as navigate.

customer_reviews.title: After initial setup and speed configuration, this is fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I've been using it for almost a week now, it's a fantastic product. It's very simple, displaying just speed and compass, it also have over speed alarm. The reflection film make it more clear on the windshield. It is accurate as well.
